question1.question: What is the minimum Python knowledge required to follow Suraj's six-week deep learning curriculum?

question2.question: What is the purpose of an experience replay buffer in deep Q-learning?
question2.option2: To test the understanding of the concepts
question2.option3: To collect data to train the Q network
question2.option4: To decide actions for the robot

question3.question: What is the benefit of separating Q-values into state values and advantage functions in the dueling network approach?
question3.option1: It slows down the learning process
question3.option2: It makes the network more prone to noisy updates
question3.option3: It enables faster and more reliable learning
question3.option4: It reduces the overall performance in game playing tasks
